item.description: https://www.facebook.... Description Hi all! As you all know door to door is one of the most important things we can do to get Ron Paul a victory in New Hampshire. This is why we are creating a canvasing of Newport for December 17th. Date: December 17th Time: 11 am Place: to be announced Campaign will buy lunch. 11:40 lunch ends and we go door to door. End canvasing just before sun down. Please invite anyone you think can help us out.
item.name: Door-To-Door in NEWPORT
